ABOUT.TITLE: ABOUT ME
ABOUT.TEXT_1: I'm a web developer specializing in the front-end world and creating 3D illustrations.
ABOUT.TEXT_2: I started creating web pages for fun at the age of 15, never imagining it would become one of my greatest passions.
ABOUT.TEXT_3: Additionally, I learned to develop applications with Flutter for a school project and also acquired skills in programming with C++ and Java.
